summary: The Northern Arizona Protection Act (H.R. 5392) aims to nullify Presidential Proclamation 10606, which established the Baaj Nwaavjo I’tah Kukveni-Ancestral Footprints of the Grand Canyon National Monument. The bill seeks to prevent future national monument designations within the same area, requiring express Congressional authorization for any such action. The bill was introduced by Mr. Gosar and co-sponsored by Mr. Crane, Ms. Hageman, and Mr. Newhouse.
